keyword: how many calories in white sliced bread
title: How Many Calories in White Sliced Bread?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in white sliced bread per slice, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition details for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in White Sliced Bread?
assumptions: Standard commercial white sliced bread, one medium slice (~25 g), unenriched unless specified.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, slice thickness, enrichment, and additives. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One slice of white sliced bread contains about 79 calories and 15 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to whole wheat sliced bread

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of white bread?
faqs.a: Approximately 79 calories per medium slice of white sliced bread.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in white sliced bread?
faqs.a: About 15 g of carbohydrates per slice, mostly from refined flour.
Yes, around 0.7 g of dietary fiber per slice, but less than whole grain options.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in white sliced bread?
faqs.a: Roughly 152 mg per slice, varying by brand and fortification.

faqs.q: Is white sliced bread high in protein?
faqs.a: No, only about 2.7 g protein per slice; pair with fillings for more.
